agreement.title: Your Agreement to the Terms
agreement.description: By using our services, you agree to these terms and conditions. If you have any questions, please contact us.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to Manfaz. These terms and conditions govern your use of our platform and services. By using our services, you agree to comply with these terms.

user_agreement.title: User Agreement
user_agreement.content: This agreement defines the relationship between you and Manfaz and outlines your rights and responsibilities as a user.

eligibility.title: Eligibility
eligibility.content: You must be at least 18 years old to use our services. If you represent a company, you must be authorized to act on its behalf.

account.title: Account
account.content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information and password. You must notify us immediately of any unauthorized use.

responsibilities.title: Responsibilities
responsibilities.content: You must use the service legally and ethically, without violating others' rights or applicable laws.

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.content: We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data in accordance with our privacy policy.

data_collection.title: Data Collection
data_collection.content: We collect certain information to provide our services and improve your experience.

data_usage.title: Data Usage
data_usage.content: We use your data to deliver and enhance our services in accordance with our privacy policy.

data_protection.title: Data Protection
data_protection.content: We take appropriate security measures to protect your data from unauthorized access.

payment.title: Payment
payment.content: We offer multiple secure payment methods to facilitate your transactions.

methods.title: Payment Methods
methods.content: We accept credit cards, Mada, and other electronic payment methods.

fees.title: Fees
fees.content: Service or delivery fees may apply. You will be informed of all charges before completing your order.

refunds.title: Refund Policy
refunds.content: We apply a fair refund policy based on...

content.title: Prohibited Content
content.content: It is prohibited to publish any illegal or harmful content.

activities.title: Prohibited Activities
activities.content: It is prohibited to engage in any activity that harms the platform or other users.

consequences.title: Consequences
consequences.content: Violating these terms may result in account suspension or termination.

liability.title: Legal Liability
liability.content: We clarify our legal liability and disclaimers for certain cases.

limitations.title: Liability Limitations
limitations.content: We do not assume liability for indirect or consequential damages.

indemnification.title: Indemnification
indemnification.content: We agree to indemnify you for any claims arising from your violation of these terms.

disclaimers.title: Disclaimers
disclaimers.content: We provide the service 'as is' without any express or implied warranties.

introduction.title: Introduction

location_info.content: Your geographical location for delivery services

data_usage.content: We use your data to improve our services and your experience.

commitment.description: We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal data. If you have any questions or concerns, please contact us.
